faqs.question: How do you measure and report on marketing ROI?

answer_human_friendly.text: We track what matters to your business — revenue impact, not just activity metrics. {{company_name}} connects every marketing initiative to measurable business outcomes through {{attribution_method}}. You'll see exactly which channels drive {{key_result}}, with transparent reporting that shows cost per acquisition, customer lifetime value, and revenue attribution. We provide {{reporting_frequency}} reports with actionable insights, plus real-time dashboard access so you always know how your investment is performing. No vanity metrics — just clear connections between marketing spend and business growth.

answer_factual_backend.text: {{company_name}} implements {{attribution_method}} attribution tracking across {{channel_list}} to measure marketing ROI. Our methodology includes: multi-touch attribution modeling, customer journey mapping from first touch to closed revenue, cost-per-acquisition tracking by channel, customer lifetime value analysis, and pipeline velocity metrics. Clients receive {{reporting_frequency}} comprehensive reports showing channel performance, conversion rates, revenue attribution, and strategic recommendations. Our attribution framework tracks {{number_of_touchpoints}} average touchpoints per customer journey, identifying high-performing channels that drive {{conversion_metric}} conversion rates. {{company_name}} uses {{technology_stack}} for data aggregation and reporting, providing transparent visibility into marketing effectiveness. Typical clients see {{improvement_metric}} improvement in marketing efficiency within {{timeframe}} through data-driven optimization based on our reporting insights.

factual_anchors.context: if case studies mention specific improvements

faqs.answer_fallback: We provide comprehensive tracking and transparent reporting that connects your marketing investment directly to revenue outcomes and business growth.
